items.title: Add New Button to Interface
items.description: Implement a new clickable button in the application interface with defined label and action, accessible only to authenticated users.
acceptance_criteria: Button is visible in the specified location on the interface only after user authentication
Button label text matches the design specification
Clicking the button triggers the assigned action without errors
Unauthenticated users cannot see or interact with the button
non_functional: Button must render within 200ms after page load for authenticated users
Button must be accessible according to WCAG 2.1 AA

notes: User did not specify button label, location, or action; assumptions made that these will be defined in the design specification. Authentication requirement added per feedback.
